name: Movable House
description: A house that can be moved by several links.

fields.name: Move to North Trigger
fields.description: Activates this variable when the house is moved to the north.

fields.name: Move to South Trigger
fields.description: Activates this variable when the house is moved to the south.

fields.name: Move to West Trigger
fields.description: Activates this variable when the house is moved to the west.

fields.name: Move to East Trigger
fields.description: Activates this variable when the house is moved to the east.
